sentences.sContent: Either way it seems certain that these people were using quite sophisticated technology and watercraft to fish offshore.
sentences.sContent_eng: Either way it seems certain that these people were using quite sophisticated technology and watercraft to fish offshore.
sentences.sCn: 不管人们用的那种方法抓鱼，似乎可以肯定，那些人使用了娴熟的技术和船只。

sentences.sContent: People use “jet ski” to refer to a wide variety of personal watercraft; “rollerblade” to mean any inline skates—and “chupacabra” to mean any weird animal.
sentences.sContent_eng: People use “jet ski” to refer to a wide variety of personal watercraft; “rollerblade” to mean any inline skates—and “chupacabra” to mean any weird animal.
sentences.sCn: 人们用“jet ski”这个词组表示各种各样的个人船只；用“rollerblade”这个词表示任何直排轮滑——也用“卓帕卡布拉”来表示任何神秘的动物。

sentences.sContent: When the Coast Guard spotted the vessel off the coast of Honduras, its crew sank the watercraft. They were later detained, according to a Coast Guard press release.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the Coast Guard spotted the vessel off the coast of Honduras, its crew sank the watercraft. They were later detained, according to a Coast Guard press release.
sentences.sCn: 据海岸警卫队透漏的消息，当海岸警卫队在洪都拉斯海岸截获该船的时候，船员将船沉入到了海底，随即，他们被拘捕了。

trans.tranOther: a boat or ship or such vessels collectively
